Name: Large guinea egg
Description: A little bigger than usual, but just as tasty.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Un poco más grande de lo habitual, pero igual de sabroso.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Etwas größer als sonst, aber genauso lecker.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un peu plus gros que d'habitude, mais tout aussi savoureux.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: A szokásosnál kicsit nagyobb, de ugyanolyan finom.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Un po' più grande del solito, ma altrettanto gustoso.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: いつもより少し大きいですが、同じくらい美味しいです。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Um pouco maior do que o habitual, mas tão saboroso quanto.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Чуть больше, чем обычно, но так же вкусно.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Normalden biraz daha büyük ama bir o kadar da lezzetli.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 比平时大一点，但一样好吃。
